Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE

Title: Requires health care professionals to prescribe opioid antagonists when prescribing an opioid
Summary: Requires health care professionals to prescribe opioid antagonists when prescribing an opioid and discuss the dangers of opioid addiction with such patient in a manner consistent with regulations promulgated by the commissioner of health.
LawCode: Amd ยง3309, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring health care professionals to prescribe opioid antagonists when prescribing an opioid
